revised_title: Bulbous Roots, Plants, and Seeds Growth in Water: Experiments and Observations
tldr: The author conducted experiments on growing bulbous roots, plants, and seeds in water. They discovered that by placing bulbs in water, they could grow stronger and healthier than those grown in soil. The author also found that dried bulbs were more successful in adapting to water environments than fresh ones. This method allowed for year-round blooming and extended the blooming season.
